page.title: 19LIFE-STYLES FASHION
page.content: Fashion is something that is con- stantly changing.Abington is mainly a professional village and this is reflected in the clothes that are worn.Most men wear a traditional dark suit, collar and tie.Uniform is worn by most Abington and Linton school children and this comprises a navy skirt,blue blouse for a girl and dark trousers, blue shirt for the boys. Young children wear T-shirt and shorts in summer and jogging suits and anoraks in winter. Older children fav- our jeans and sweatshirts. Women have a wider choice, most wear some sort of trousers for housework and for smarter occasions knee length dresses.The mini skirt ofthe 60's made a partial comeback but only with teen- agers.Fashion in 1985 is greatly infl- uenced by the media and the clothes worn by the famous.
